        <title>Congressional Hearings - New items on GovInfo</title>
        <link>https://www.govinfo.gov/app/collection/chrg</link>
        <description>Provides access to newly published GovInfo content from the  Congressional Hearings. A hearing is a meeting or session of a Senate, House, joint, or special committee of Congress, usually open to the public, to obtain information and opinions on proposed legislation, conduct an investigation, or evaluate/oversee the activities of a government department or the implementation of a Federal law.</description>
